thread.title: Three-peat: Amazing Hawks do it again
thread.title_full: Three-peat: Amazing Hawks do it again

title: Three-peat: Amazing Hawks do it again
text:
AFL Grand Final 2015: Hawthorn defeats West Coast by 46 points at the MCG Warwick Green Herald Sun AFL Grand Final 2015: Hawthorn defeats West Coast by 46 points at the MCG Warwick Green Herald Sun Hawks rewrite history books winning 3rd straight GF 2:10 
AFL: Watch highlights from the Hawthorn Hawks 46-point 2015 AFL Grand Final win over the West Coast Eagles. October 3rd 2015 2 hours ago /video/video.news.com.au/Sport/AFL/News/ 
ONE suspicion going into this match was that premiership-hardened Hawthorn would better handle the pressure of a Grand Final. 
And that’s exactly how it proved. 
Another suspicion was that the Eagles’ defensive zoning would be less effective on the wide expanses of the MCG. 
Jot that one down as confirmed, too. 
And apart from two bursts of Eagles tenacity either side of halftime, Hawthorn dominated this contest so comprehensively that it proved another suspicion: that they are the equal of any great team of the AFL era. 
The first half told the story. Other Stories
